CustomField.formula: OR( TEXT(Deal__r.StageName) = 'Loan Processing', TEXT(Deal__r.StageName) = 'Processing Hold', TEXT(Deal__r.StageName) = 'Underwriting', TEXT(Deal__r.StageName) = 'UW Hold', TEXT(Deal__r.StageName) = 'Approved by Committee', TEXT(Deal__r.StageName) = 'Closed Won' ) && OR ( Deal_RecordType__c = 'LOC_Loan', Deal_RecordType__c ='Single_Asset_Bridge_Loan', Deal_RecordType__c ='Table_Funded_CRE_Loan_Active', Deal_RecordType__c ='Table_Funded_CRE_Loan', Deal_RecordType__c ='Acquired_Bridge_Loan', Deal_RecordType__c ='Acquired_Bridge_Loan_Active' ) && Loan_Type__c = 'Credit Line' && Approved_Advance_Amount_Max_Total__c >= 1000000
CustomField.label: Requires IC Approval
